name: Explosive Escape
description:
Destroy enemy vessels, upgrade your ship and achieve your freedom!

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44

Controls (Shown in game)

Accelerate/Decelerate: W/S or Up/Down

Turn: A/D or Left/Right

Fire: Hold either Left click, Space, J, or F
